description.value: An orc blade of Ilneval is often marked with Ilneval's symbol (an upright, blood-spattered sword). The tattoo is commonly found on its calf or thigh muscle. Harvesting the item requires flaying the skin under the mark, in one piece. The mark retains a connection to the deity, and is valued by many spellcasters. Healers and potion makers may find the mark useful for the alchemical properties of the tattooed skin.
